entry.title: HW00
entry.summary: Welcome This is numerical analysis lecture note for Mathematical Chemistry Class 2022-1. In this post, I am giving you the first homework to open and run the below python code: https://github.com/changwmyung/numerical_analysis_chem/blob/master/homework/hw00/Hello_World.ipynb print For the first line, you will note that we are calling a function called print to print out a simple string “Hel...
